mutants.code:
from collections import deque

def getLoser(arr, k):
    dq = deque([arr[0]])
    max_lost = arr[0]
    lose_count = 1
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        if arr[i] < dq[0]:
            lose_count += 1
            max_lost = max(max_lost, dq[0])
            dq.append(arr[i])
            if lose_count == k:
                return max_lost
        else:
            lose_count = 1
            max_lost = dq[0]
            dq.append(dq.popleft())
            dq[0] = arr[i]
    return dq[0]
